decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be completed before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) and condition 5 of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 as amended.

| The building permitted to be used as a dwellinghouse by virtue of Class MA shall remain in use as a dwellinghouse within the meaning of Class C3 of Schedule 1 to the Use Classes Order and for no other purpose, except to the extent that the other purpose is ancillary to the use as a dwellinghouse.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) and condition 6 of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 as amended.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): Acoustic Consultants LTD - Noise Impact Assessment dated September 2016, Site Location Plan 1503-WARP-04, Proposed Ground Floor Plan 250 Rev 00, Proposed First Floor 251 Rev 00, Proposed Second Floor Plan 252 Rev 00
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The development hereby approved shall not be occupied until refuse and recycling storage, in accordance with the Local Planning Authority Standards, has been provided and has been fully implemented and made available for use. These facilities shall thereafter be retained for use at all times.

Reason: In the interests of the adequate disposal, storage and collection of waste and recycling in accordance with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy SI 8 of the London Plan (2021), the NPPF (2023) and the Ealing Council Waste management guidelines for architects and developers document.

| Cycle storage for a minimum of 2 bicycles, shall be provided onsite in accordance with all adopted standards prior to occupation of the proposed residential units and be continuously available and retained for the life of the development hereby approved. Cycle storage shall be secure and covered.
Reason: To provide adequate bicycle storage to align with Sustainable Transport SPG and policy T5 of the London Plan (2021).
| The building permitted to be used as a dwelling by virtue of Class MA shall be permanently occupied by no more than 6 persons.
Reason: In order to comply with the Technical housing standards - nationally described space standard (2015).

| The sound insulation of the building envelope including glazing specifications shall be based on environmental noise levels occurring during most of the year, ie. during school and work weekdays and should be implemented according to the recommendations in the report by Acoustic Consultants Ltd. ref. 6480/CG/pw dated 28 September 2016. If compliance requires the windows to be closed, then acoustically attenuated mechanical ventilation and cooling shall be installed as necessary (with air intake from the cleanest aspect of the building and low self-noise). Internal and external amenity noise levels shall not exceed the criteria set by BS8233:2014. Approved details shall be implemented prior to occupation of the development and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason: In the interests of the living conditions of the future occupiers of the site in accordance with policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy D14 of The London Plan (2021), Ealing SPG10 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use from Commercial, Business and Service (Use Class E) to Dwellinghouses (Use Class C3)
description: Change of use of the ground floor, first floor and second floor  (Use Class E) into 1 self-contained residential unit (Use Class C3).  (Class MA, 56 Day Prior Approval Process)
